scripts.docker-stop:
npm run docker-db-dump && CURRENT_DIR_NAME=$(basename "$PWD" | tr -dc '[:alnum:]
' | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') && docker stop ${CURRENT_DIR_NAME}_nginx_php_1 ${CURRENT_DIR_NAME}_phpmyadmin_1 ${CURRENT_DIR_NAME}_mysql_1 ${CURRENT_DIR_NAME}_redis_1
scripts.docker-rm:
npm run docker-stop && CURRENT_DIR_NAME=$(basename "$PWD" | tr -dc '[:alnum:]
' | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') && docker rm ${CURRENT_DIR_NAME}_nginx_php_1 ${CURRENT_DIR_NAME}_phpmyadmin_1 ${CURRENT_DIR_NAME}_mysql_1 ${CURRENT_DIR_NAME}_redis_1
scripts.docker-ports:
CURRENT_DIR_NAME=$(basename "$PWD" | tr -dc '[:alnum:]
' | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') && NGINXPORT=$(docker port ${CURRENT_DIR_NAME}_nginx_php_1 80) && PHPMYADMINPORT=$(docker port ${CURRENT_DIR_NAME}_phpmyadmin_1 80) && echo server: $NGINXPORT  && echo phpmyadmin: $PHPMYADMINPORT && open -a 'Google Chrome' http://$PHPMYADMINPORT http://$NGINXPORT
scripts.docker-db-dump:
CURRENT_DIR_NAME=$(basename "$PWD" | tr -dc '[:alnum:]
' | tr '[:upper:]' '[:lower:]') && docker exec ${CURRENT_DIR_NAME}_mysql_1 sh -c 'exec mysqldump --databases wp_foundation_six -uroot -p"$MYSQL_ROOT_PASSWORD"' > ./data/backups/wp_foundation_six_$(date +"%Y%m%d%H%M%s")_database.sql
